title: Political Unrest In Yemen A Blow To U.S. Counterrorism Efforts
teaser: Rachel Martin speaks with Stephen Seche, former U.S. Ambassador to Yemen about the decision to close down the U.S. embassy in Sana'a and how that could affect U.S. counterterrorism efforts in Yemen.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
